code: public void testIndexExistsWithBlocksInPlace() throws IOException {     internalCluster().setBootstrapMasterNodeIndex(0).     Settings settings = Settings.builder().put(GatewayService.RECOVER_AFTER_NODES_SETTING.getKey(), 99).build().     String node = internalCluster().startNode(settings).     assertThrows(client(node).admin().indices().prepareExists("test").setMasterNodeTimeout(TimeValue.timeValueSeconds(0)), MasterNotDiscoveredException.class).     // shut down node so that test properly cleans up     internalCluster().stopRandomNode(InternalTestCluster.nameFilter(node)). }
